function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent self-quarantine guidelines.","Impact":"Large scale re-scheduling of existing projects leading to severe losses for the industry.","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety measures on construction sites, provide remote work options, and establish contingency plans for workforce shortages.","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, project management software, and monitoring systems.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and industry stakeholders.","Owner":"Construction firms and industry regulators."},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction sector leading to a drop in fixed asset investment and real estate development.","Impact":"Reduction in construction growth from 3.1% to 0.5% in 2020.","Mitigation":"Implement economic stimulus packages, diversify investment portfolios, and promote sustainable construction practices.","Technologies":"Economic modeling software, investment management tools, and sustainable construction technology.","People":"Investors, government authorities, and construction industry leaders.","Owner":"Government agencies, financial institutions, and construction industry associations."},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on the food industry, including closure of restaurants, cafes, and luxury food service providers, and difficulty meeting rising demands due to panic buying.","Impact":"Disruption of food supply chains and inability to meet demands from panic buying.","Mitigation":"Enhance stock management systems, implement purchase limits, and adjust distribution strategies to accommodate increased demand.","Technologies":"Inventory management software, online ordering platforms, and supply chain optimization tools.","People":"Food industry workers, retailers, and consumers.","Owner":"Food industry companies, retail associations, and government agencies."}]}
